review: Overall this little device is wonderfully convenient with a great user interface and an expanding library of compatible apps.  I give it 4 instead of 5 stars for two reasons:1) It only has HDMI out and no separate audio out.  So you're basically forced to use the substandard speakers that come with tv's unless you buy a device to strip out the audio like this:  http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00G9FDJNA/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_152) This guy seems to use a lot of power as it heats up a good bit.  It has to be powered by a separate source as the HDMI won't power it. So you have an additional, awkward cord to deal with.
